body_html: @tilarids That sounds like it might have a different cause, since it looks like there's enough static information there to infer the appropriate shape. Please open a new issue with a complete set of details, and somebody who works on tf.layers will take a look.

body: @tilarids That sounds like it might have a different cause, since it looks like there's enough static information there to infer the appropriate shape. Please open a new issue with a complete set of details, and somebody who works on `tf.layers` will take a look.
